description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. In this survival action adventure, a volcano erupts, raining fiery destruction! People are in peril, trapped in the valley by corrosive acid rain and exploding volcanic rocks, seeking refuge in the forest, in caves and in their cabins. You witness the devastation from your campsite in the mountains. Will you lead the rescue effort?  Will you make the ultimate sacrifice?  Will you become a hero?
